mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock ( item_id, stock_amount, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{itemId}, #{stockAmount}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select:
SELECT s.stock_amount
FROM stock s
JOIN item i ON i.item_id = s.item_id AND i.store_id = #{storeId} AND i.is_active = b'1'
WHERE s.item_id = #{itemId}
mapper.update:
